Desc.entry: Suzanne Bingham offers talks on local and family history. Subjects include: sources of family history; a history of Sheffield newspapers; the story of the Sheffield flood; Sheffield working lives; the story of the Sheffield Blitz; the Anti-Slavery Movement in Sheffield; the rise and fall of the workhouses; the life and times of Edward Carpenter; Victorian epidemics: death and concepts of hygiene; from slum to suburbia: social housing and the emancipation of Sheffield's housewives. Fee charged.
